tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Shipments (
    shipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tracking_number STRING,
    origin_location STRING,
    destination_location STRING,
    shipping_carrier STRING,
    estimated_delivery_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_status STRING
)

CREATE TABLE shipping_info (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
tracking_number VARCHAR(255),
shipping_company VARCHAR(255),
shipping_status VARCHAR(50),
estimated_delivery_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE payment_details (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
order_id INT,
payment_method VARCHAR(50),
payment_status VARCHAR(50),
transaction_id VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE shipping_api (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tracking_number UUID,
    delivery_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_api (
    tracking_number UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    current_location TEXT,
    estimated_delivery_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE payment_gateway (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_status TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE shipping_address (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    street_address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    zip_code TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Shipments (
  shipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT NOT NULL,
  tracking_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  shipment_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES ShippingProviders(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Payments (
  payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  gateway_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (gateway_id) REFERENCES PaymentGateways(gateway_id)
);
